languages.text: {n}Мрачный хохоток пробивается до вас по вокс-линии.{/n} "Пока вы отсутствовали, что-то — или кто-то — решил поживиться вашим столичным миром? Что ж. Сделайте так, чтобы эта "ересь" пожалела о своем появлении на свет".

{n}A dark chuckle reaches you through the vox-channel.{/n} "While you were away, something — or someone — decided your capital world was up for grabs? Oh well. Make sure this 'heresy' rues the day it was born."
languages.original_text: {n}Мрачный хохоток пробивается до вас по вокс-линии.{/n} "Пока вы отсутствовали, что-то — или кто-то — решил поживиться вашим столичным миром? Что ж. Сделайте так, чтобы эта "ересь" пожалела о своем появлении на свет".

traits.locale_text: {n}A dark giggle reaches you through the vox channel.{/n} "While you were away, something — or someone — decided your capital world was up for grabs? Oh well. Make sure this 'heresy' rues the day it was born."

{n}A dark chuckle reaches you through the vox-channel.{/n} "While you were away, something — or someone — decided your capital world was up for grabs? Oh well. Make sure this 'heresy' rues the day it was born."

languages.text: {n}Ein finsteres Kichern tönt aus dem Vox-Kanal.{/n} "Hat in Eurer Abwesenheit wirklich etwas – oder jemand – beschlossen, dass Eure Hauptwelt zu haben ist? Na schön. Sorgt dafür, dass diese 'Ketzerei' den Tag ihrer Geburt bereut."
languages.original_text: {n}A dark chuckle reaches you through the vox-channel.{/n} "While you were away, something — or someone — decided your capital world was up for grabs? Oh well. Make sure this 'heresy' rues the day it was born."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein finsteres Kichern tönt aus dem Vox-Kanal.{/n} "Hat in Eurer Abwesenheit wirklich etwas – oder jemand – beschlossen, dass Eure Hauptwelt zu haben ist? Na schön. Sorgt dafür, dass diese 'Ketzerei' den Tag ihrer Geburt bereut."

languages.text: {n}Un rire sinistre retentit du canal-vox.{/n} « En votre absence, quelque chose, ou plutôt quelqu'un, a estimé que votre monde-capitale était à saisir. Peu importe. Assurez-vous que cette "hérésie" regrette le jour de sa naissance. »
languages.original_text: {n}A dark chuckle reaches you through the vox-channel.{/n} "While you were away, something — or someone — decided your capital world was up for grabs? Oh well. Make sure this 'heresy' rues the day it was born."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un rire sinistre retentit du canal-vox.{/n} « En votre absence, quelque chose, ou plutôt quelqu'un, a estimé que votre monde-capitale était à saisir. Peu importe. Assurez-vous que cette "hérésie" regrette le jour de sa naissance. »

languages.text: {n}某个阴冷的笑声通过音阵频道传到了你的耳中。{/n}“你不在的这段时间里，有什么东西，或者是什么人，打算夺走你的首都世界，对吧？噢，快让这些‘异端分子’后悔来到这个世界吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}A dark chuckle reaches you through the vox-channel.{/n} "While you were away, something — or someone — decided your capital world was up for grabs? Oh well. Make sure this 'heresy' rues the day it was born."

traits.locale_text: {n}某个阴冷的笑声通过音阵频道传到了你的耳中。{/n}“你不在的这段时间里，有什么东西，或者是什么人，打算夺走你的首都世界，对吧？噢，快让这些‘异端分子’后悔来到这个世界吧。”
{n}某个阴冷的笑声通过音阵频道传到了你的耳中。{/n}“你不在的这段时间里，有什么东西，或者是什么人，打算夺走你的首都世界，对吧？噢，快让这些‘异端分子’后悔来到这个世界吧。”

languages.text: {n}Te llega una risa siniestra desde el canal de voco.{/n} «¿Algo... o alguien... ha decidido saquear su mundo capital mientras no estaba? Qué lástima. Asegúrese de que esta "herejía" lamenta haber nacido».
languages.original_text: {n}A dark chuckle reaches you through the vox-channel.{/n} "While you were away, something — or someone — decided your capital world was up for grabs? Oh well. Make sure this 'heresy' rues the day it was born."

traits.locale_text: {n}Te llega una risa siniestra desde el canal de voco.{/n} «¿Algo... o alguien... ha decidido saquear su mundo capital mientras no estaba? Qué lástima. Asegúrese de que esta "herejía" lamenta haber nacido».

languages.text: {n}ヴォクスチャネル越しに暗い笑い声が聞こえてきた。{/n}「あなたが留守の間に、何かが…あるいは誰かが、あなたの首都惑星を奪うことにしたようですね。まあいいでしょう。その『異端』に己が生まれた日を必ず後悔させてやりましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}A dark chuckle reaches you through the vox-channel.{/n} "While you were away, something — or someone — decided your capital world was up for grabs? Oh well. Make sure this 'heresy' rues the day it was born."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォクスチャネル越しに暗い笑い声が聞こえてきた。{/n}「あなたが留守の間に、何かが…あるいは誰かが、あなたの首都惑星を奪うことにしたようですね。まあいいでしょう。その『異端』に己が生まれた日を必ず後悔させてやりましょう」

languages.text: {n}Voks kanalından karanlık bir kıkırtı yükseliyor.{/n} "Siz yokken biri ya da bir şey, başdünyanızın sahipsiz olduğunu mu sanmış yoksa? Pekâlâ. Bu 'kâfirliği' doğduğuna pişman edin."
languages.original_text: {n}A dark chuckle reaches you through the vox-channel.{/n} "While you were away, something — or someone — decided your capital world was up for grabs? Oh well. Make sure this 'heresy' rues the day it was born."
